name: ALABAMA SHINE
text: This place is unprofessional in customer service and products are defective.  I don’t recommend them to anyone.   I called about a defective product and there so called team leader was not professional and I drove over 25 miles one way.  I know this is only store for these products but once out the door and u leave.   It’s yours So beware of what they recommend and google it first then save money order the product on eBay or Amazon

resp.text: We apologize that we didn't meet your expectations. We have thousands of different products and we try to only carry the best products available, but even the best products sometimes have issues. We will be happy to exchange the product for you or if you would like to discuss it further please feel free to call us and ask for the Director of Operations.

name: Oleta Bruner
text: Love it best in the state of alabama

resp.text: Thank you very much Oleta!

name: David Goodwin
text: Great uniforms , custom badges , gun belts an accessorys , custom name tags etc,etc

resp.text: Thank you David. We are happy to have you as a customer!

name: Russell Tayler
text: Dealing with Clark has been a great experience his knowledge in the welding supply business has been a truly eye opening experience. I went in there almost with an arrogant attitude thinking that i knew what I wanted. But after listening to me patiently and asking questions, and finding out what I really needed he put me on to the right product. Thanks Clark I cant believe that I have not been using this for my welding applications.

name: Taylor holley
text: Went there an waited at the counter a lady just looked at me but wouldn't help... Horrible service

resp.text: We are sorry that our Customer Service Rep was tied up and unable to speak with you when you came in. Please give us another chance to show you our normally outstanding customer service.

name: Bruce Jones
text: Very good prices with excellent customer service

name: ROY TAYLOR
text: Great place

name: Jason Grant
text: they have anything you need

name: T Ward
text: I had a great experience getting all my extinguishers serviced and certified

name: Aurelio de Mosqueda
text: I think is expensive because there's no competition around.

name: Robbies Miracle
text: Great service, quick, and easy.

name: Aershia Off
text: Is Good Place

name: Thomas Sears
text: The people at the store are nice, but the online ordering is terrible. Got the wrong number of bolts the first time, then they sent a replacement bolt and it was missing the nut, so I had to go buy that separately. Won't order from Fastenal again

name: Scott Moss
text: The young lady behind the counter is helpful and great. Their online ordering and pick up in the stores is disorganized and terrible.

name: Alexa Wiley
text: Very helpful! David went above and beyond to help my mom and I find some odd sized bolts we were looking for!

name: Kelly Falter
text: Not sure what the previous review was referring to about high prices.  I have been buying fasteners from them for a few years now.  They are a fraction of the price of Home Depot or Lowe's and if they don't have what you need, they can usually get it in house within a day or so.

name: Bolt Movers
text:
Fastenal, a company with 2,683 stores CANNOT give you refund except for the store that you purchased the product at.

Because there computer system does not communicate with any of the other stores.

Unfortunately the product was purchased out of town and now I will need to drive 4 hours to get the $98 dollar refund for the screws that were purchased.

Keep in mind it is 2019. I could FaceTime with Ariana Grande across the country at a moments notice, she just never answers my calls.

name: Walter Rice
text: Great staff great selection

name: Jessica Reece
text: There are no prices posted on anything and instead of allowing me to just look around while my husband looked for a fastener he specifically needed, I was followed like I was some criminal. We left without buying anything because the price was more than triple what is in their website. Ridiculous to treat people like criminals and then try to rob us.

name: Renea Obryan
text: Great Company to work with. Our service Representative Derek is so nice and helpful, an asset to the Company. Great experience all around from Sales to Service. We love our rugs!!

name: Jr 5 Mcmillian
text: Thomas Truck Lines, Inc. experience over the years with UniFirst and more especially their representative, Danny, that comes by every week to service our office and shop has been as good as it gets.  Danny is an asset to UniFirst in the highest degree.  He is always upbeat and pleasant.  He is professional and is willing to take the time to answer any questions that we might have.  Highly recommend UniFirst and Danny to any one thinking of using a uniform service.

name: Renea Green
text: Williams Paint And Body Shop from Marianna, Fl here! We LOVE Derek Watkins! He is always in a good mood and upbeat. When we have questions or concerns he is on top of it getting it handled, no problem. 10/10 best there is! He is a great asset to UniFirst Uniform Services.

name: Whitewater Environmental
text: Absolutely the best customer service representative (Derek) on our route! He makes sure we have everything we need and communicates all schedule changes in advance. Loves that he brings In the catalogs for opportunities to buy merchandise too.

name: Sharon Lampley
text: I work here , started yesterday. Love It 💕

name: Dajun Godwin
text: My name is Dajun Godwin and I am one of the Route Service Managers here at UniFirst in Dothan, Al. It has been a pleasure to work with this company for the past nine years and I look forward to many more! UniFirst, not only in Dothan, but company wide, is a generous company who not only looks after their customers, but their employees needs and desires. UniFirst is a great company to work for with great benefits and provides so many with the opportunities for growth within the company. I would recommend UniFirst as not just a company that will give you a great job, but a company you can grow in and build a career in!

name: Lillie Gilbert
text: This is Jackson county road and bridge Derek is so awesome I love working with him, he is a super nice guy. I appreciate how he communicate with me about the uniform's. It's always good to see him on Thursday ☺️

name: Cathy Daughtry
text:
Chris is always so helpful and eager to help us anyway he can. Always comes in with a smile.
Thanks for keeping our guys uniform ready.  We appreciate all you do for us,  Chris.    ~Cathy, with ADS Security- Dothan, Al.~

name: Londa Rambeau
text: Mr. Danny always does an AMAZING job! Everyone here at (Georgia Gulf Sulfur) really appreciate his time and effort. Thank you!

name: Myra Johnson
text: Derek Watkins is always very friendly, courteous & helpful. He always helps with whatever we need and always has a smile on his face.  Great customer service representative for your company.

name: Donta Wade
text: Mr. Danny is amazing! Always on time and great customer service! will recommend him and UniFirst to anyone. Signed THE TOWN OF GORDON, ALABAMA.

name: Connie Adams
text: I am an employee of XPO Logistics and Michael Lingo is our route driver.   He is always so helpful, courteous and pleasant.  He always goes about his work with a smile on his face.   He is a wonderful representation of your company and you should be proud to have him as an employee!

name: Quetta Johnson
text: Derek comes to Cobbs and he is a great guy very respectable! Does his job well! Always asking what he can do to help more or make things better!

name: Regina Lacaze
text: Exceeds our expectations! Service is wonderful, friendly and fast! Always goes the extra mile to make sure you are 100% satisfied!

name: BJs Grill
text: This is Jennifer, owner of BJs Grill in Chipley, FL.  We have the most amazing route driver, Derek! He always goes above and beyond to make sure we have everything we need at our restaurant! He is always a pleasure to see each week and takes his time to get to know his customers!! He is a definite asset!! 😁

name: Felicia Bowick
text: My name is Felicia Bowick Manger at a Convenient Store and Michael Lingo work my store and I must say he gives great customer service 😀 I be satisfied every time never skip a beat Keep up the good work  Michael 👍

name: cheryl davidson
text: Derek is knowledgeable and always professional and polite! He is a pleasure to do business with here at Washington County BOCC.

name: Leonard Redmon
text: This Skeeter from Finish Line Automotive, our route guy Derek, is great. He's always thorough and very helpful.

name: Stefanie Drummond
text: I work for Kraton Chemical in Marianna and we have the BEST SERVICE thanks to Derek!!  He's always super friendly and helpful!!

name: Derek Watkins
text: I work here as an RSR and I love working and servicing our customers! Great place to work and great place to get a opportunity to meet new people!

name: Steve Bond
text: I'm Steve" Cowboy" Bond counter team leader at Mayer Electric Supply in Dothan Alabama, We use unifirst mainly because of the friendly service I receive from my route driver Michael Lingo...No one we get service from is as spot on in all categories as Michael. Great asset for unifirst....

name: Anthony Wade
text: This is Aaron at William's Bros trucking and our route guy Derek is awesome! He always fixes any uniforms that needs to be repaired! Friendly as well

name: Wayne Morris
text: I own and operate Morris Auto Parts in Ashford Alabama and have had the privilege of doing business with Mr. Danny Pope for 17 years now. He is always professional and courteous and is an outstanding representative that Unifirst should be proud to have on their team.

name: Jeremie Locke
text: O’Reilly’s in Marianna unifirst driver Derek is awesome and has great attitude. And always does great job thank you Derek...

name: JACKSON HONDA
text:
UniFirst has been an exceptional company while catering to our needs. Courtney visits weekly and is always such a joy. We all look forward to seeing her.  She presents a professional demeanor while remaining very personable. Prior to Courtney taking over our route, Dajun was our A-1! It is always a great surprise when he subs our route. We could not ask for better customer service than that provided by both Courtney and Dajun! Both are the epitome of excellent customer service.

-Jackson Honda & Used Cars, Andalusia, AL

name: Kim Hutchinson
text: I think I can speak for my entire department at Gulf Coast Truck , when I say we think very highly of Michael Lingo.   Michael is extremely dependable, professional and friendly.   His sunny disposition always puts a smile on our faces, he is such a joy to work with.

name: Carmeshia Walker
text: Great company, great managers, and just all around great place to work.

text: I am the owner of Mia’s Italian Restaurant here in Dothan. Have done business  for 22 years with them. Absolutely love my driver Michael Lingo. He is a great guy and always there when I need him

name: Donna Kay Anderson
text: We use Unifirst for our employee uniforms and have been very pleased with their services.  Great staff, especially Xavier!  He is always friendly and is a great representative for the company.

name: Nicole Bradley
text: The Jackson County BOCC has used UniFirst for the last several years. Derek became our driver in 2020 and has been very attentive and helpful to us as a customer with a wide variety of departments and locations as well as a chaotic period of time in which our main building was inaccessible to the public and required him going out of his way to use our back doors and even detours within the building.

name: Beau Gibson
text: We receive A+ product and customer service here at Covington Heavy Duty parts from UniFirst. Lingo is the best route man we could ask for. Highly recommended for businesses locally.

text: We at Early County Public Works have the best service. Chris Lett helps me with any problems I have or any questions about our invoice. Couldn't ask for anyone better. He is always smiling and has a very good attitude.

If you need a uniform service that consistently meets & exceeds your expectations, Unifirst in Dothan is who you call!

text: We at Louisville Pecan Co. have used Unifirst for 10 years or more. Michael Lingo is our delivery driver and he is always polite and efficient. Michael gets A++ for friendly service.

text: On behalf of Covington Casket, to say that Courtney and Dajun are the absolute best to work with is putting it mildly, they come highly recommended for any future endeavers, they are very polite and handles their job and customers with much respect. It is indeed a pleasure to work with them.

text: Chris is on top if his game, he understands what is needed for my company and he delivers.

text: My company has done business with Unifirst for a while, Chris is always a delight when he comes in on our route! That’s always a plus!

name: R ll
text: This is the best place I have ever worked. I enjoy my job and the people I work with.

name: Pat Zorn
text:
We have been with Unifirst for 10 years and we have always had GREAT service. Jamey, our delivery driver, is outstanding...True Professional.
Samson Steel Truss.

name: Jim Ed Brown
text: I'm employed with Covington Cleaner & Equipment (DIVISION OF CHDP) in Andalusia, Al. We've only been open since Oct 2015. Once we first started getting our uniforms from UniFirst, I have to say, I have ZERO complaints with our service. We've had several changes that we asked in our initial fitting, from the pants size, to the shirts, and the style each person felt comfortable in. And each time a request was made, the next delivery (each week), our request was fulfilled, and with a smile on top of that.  If there's a business out there that has been searching for a great  uniform service, then look no further. THIS IS IT!!!

name: Antonio Caceres
text: jamie, our delivery guy here to our MAACO of Dothan location is by far, one of the most professional, hard working and honest individuals i have come across in the rental uniform field. Always on time, courteous and polite to all of our needs in the front office with our mats and our uniforms. Wished we had 4 of him working for us here!

name: Bonnie HCG
text: I am with the Henry Co Gin and Dajun is our UniFirst rep and he does an excellent job.  He is always cheerful and willing to hear any problems or concerns we may have, which is usually none or very small, and handles them immediately.   The workers know they can ask him questions about purchasing pants, shirts or jackets for themselves and he is very helpful in answering all their questions.  We are extremely pleased with the service we receive from UniFirst and Dajun.

name: Spenser Peters
text:
I own Spensers meat market in Dothan
Unifirst has provided me with great product and wonderful customer service over the years!
The drivers are very pleasant to deal with also!
I'd highly recommend them to anyone looking for services!

name: Jamie Croft
text: I work with Opp's Co-op in Opp, AL.  UniFirst of Dothan, AL provides us with great service.  Dejun is the best! He always makes sure we are pleased with the service and does what ever he can for us. Highly recommend UniFirst of Dothan!

name: Christi Peterson
text:
I am the owner of Ray's Restaurant. I would like to say that our delivery driver, Jamie is the best! And for him I give him 5 stars. He always makes sure that we have what we need and goes above and beyond to make sure that we get it. Thanks Jamie!

The reason that I am giving Uni1st an overall 3  stars is because we often have problems withour towels being full of lint. They also come torn or very worn also. We sometimes do not get a full bag, shorting us before our next delivery.  Our aprons that we receive often have half of the tie torn off. So we can't even tie them on. Also, they come very stained occasionally as if they have been mildewed and then laundered. The mildew stain is still there after the wash. We pay a fee each week for these items to be replaced as needed, but we rarely see new items in the
mix. We have also had problems with the posting of payments in a timely manner. Because the payments are not posted we then get a late charge added to the bill. It would be great if these small issues could get taken care of.

name: Tiffany Blackmon
text: The Dothan Housing Authority -Henry Green Central Office really enjoys the service that we receive from Uni First our delivery man: "Dajun" is very courteous, reliable, and efficient. GREAT JOB !!!

name: Alex Ethridge
text:
We are so pleased with our service from UniFirst here at Keystone Automotive! Having a clean environment is important to us when running a business and UniFirst gives us the resources to do so. Our friendly driver, Dajun Godwin, always shows up with our clean floor mats and soap with a smile on his face! He does everything for us! We couldn't be happier with this company!

Alex Ethridge
Dothan, Al.
Accountant

name: Daniel Draughon
text: Unifirst is our uniform provider at Tri - State Commercial Tire in Dothan, Alabama and our representative is Jamey Watkins. We could not be happier with the service we receive from them. Jamey is always on time and has a great attitude!

name: Amber Carpenter
text: I am Amber Carpenter with Jackson Honda and I recommend UniFirst out of Dothan AL to any company who is in the market for uniforms they provide great service. Great customer service!!!!

name: Debbie Rawls
text: I am employed with Covington Casket Co in Andalusia, AL and Dajun is our service guy and I would like to rate him as a 5 star service man, he is and has always serviced Covington Casket with great service and much respect.

name: john banks
text: Arnold's Automotive says UniFirst is a great company with great customer service!

name: Judy Perdue
text:
I have had Unifirst for five years and they are a great company to do business with!  They have worked with me to help me stay within my budget and they give me great service.  I have a regular representative, Dajon Godwin, but all of the subs and management are great guys.  They are always up with a smile, and they make me feel like they appreciate my business.  I would recommend Unifirst Uniform Company to anyone looking to rent uniforms and other items.

Sincerely,
Judy Perdue, Property Manager
Colony Square Apts.

name: Rachel Walton
text: Service as expected! Friendly route driver.

name: Deborah tolbert
text: Pretty good selection of work boots. The only somewhat negative was we needed a certain size that wasn't on the shelf. The person went in the back and then came back and said that the truck driver took the key to the trucks home.  So she couldn't go look on the truck for the size we needed. We had to settle for a different choice.

name: Mike coleman
text:
I've got to admit; as I entered the plaza and several shops closed my aspersions slipped but!!! Without-a-doubt???? One of the best selections of NameBrand and Also Mid-Range Work boots and... Other shoes too of course But I was focused entirely on work boots!
The staff treated me with More patients than "I" probably could have??!! Lol
Very pleasant experience and wearing my boots (6) hours the latter( Yep! Wore those suckers home! :-), and lovein' - thus far!!

name: William findley
text: Very friendly staff and a great selection of shoes

name: Frog Price
text: Great selection, good staff. Nice place.

name: B Ben Ezra
text: Products are great but  sales associate is terrible no customer service skills makes you feel like you asking him to do you a favor, his attitude makes want to get out of there ASAP. I understand he has mental issue but he does not need to be in direct contact with customers.

name: Jeremy Logan
text: Terrible selection. Said they carried my brand's boots, but when I got there they had exactly one style and that was it.

name: Juston Dailey
text: Great spot

name: Stacy Brunner
text: Nice

name: Eugene Freeman
text: Very rude

name: Jessica Davis
text: GREAT

name: Project 97
text: I like Grainger and have never had a problem until now. I just tried to call the mobile location and they woman that answered the phone said that there is no way to be transferred to an exact store. If that is true that’s the craziest thing I’ve ever heard. I asked her so if you can’t transfer me to them, then just give me the number to them and I’ll call. Her response was the store doesn’t have a number. I asked, so there is absolutely no way possible to communicate or get in touch with anyone at that location? And she said that’s correct. It has been that way for years she said. It blew my mind. Truly the craziest thing I have heard in quite a while.

resp.text: Hi, Chris. Thank you for the feedback. Our local branches do not take calls, allowing them to assist our customers who walk in the door. Our customer service team can be reached at 1(800)472-4643 and are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. They have access to the same information to ensure you receive the right information when you need it. ^Amber, Grainger Social Team

name: Stacy Upshaw
text: I was surprised at how good the customer service is over the telephone, very helpful looking up part numbers and the shipping was very fast

resp.text: We're very happy we could help, Stacy! Thank you for sharing this and thanks for choosing Grainger!

name: Rock
text:
Not open on Saturday but the Grainger website says it IS open. It is NOT open on Saturday. I just drove a freaking hour to come buy work boots.
Why not be open on Saturday anyway? We work monday-friday in the normal world when we'd go here.

name: Goddbod. Junya “iceberg” Winston
text: nice neighborhood..

name: Wes Allday
text: Nice selection in inventory, staff is helpful with finding/ordering needed parts. Prices can be a bit steep.

name: Doug Fleming
text: Why is this the only electrical supplier that WONT let you speak to a local store without jumping through hoops?

resp.text: Hi, Doug. Thank you for the feedback. Our local branches do not take calls, allowing them to assist our customers who walk in the door. Our customer service team is set up to assist our Customers 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, and has access to the same information to ensure you receive the right information when you need it. ^Amber, Grainger Social Team

name: Cyle Bennett
text: Friendly staff . Fast service. Period

name: Vicki Gray
text: The guys are super nice and informative

resp.text: Thank you for your review of Smart Start. If you need any assistance, please contact us at 1-800-880-3394 or visit our website at www.smartstartinc.com

name: ANDRE AUSBON
text: Of all the Shelter places we looked at, these folks are the best in my opinion.  They have been specializing in building quality shelters for 25+ years.  We first made the short drive to their facility and was able to see several different styles.  The staff was very helpful and polite in pointing out all the options for door and seating placement.  They were helpful in understanding the different features on an indoor shelter vs outdoor shelter. They clearly discussed all the associated costs, delivery, etc.   They properly set your expectations on expected completion date.  We had ours delivered and installed in our Detach Garage.  We feel much more comfortable now having the shelter to protect us in time of need.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review and thank you for choosing us as your severe weather protection!! We are extremely grateful.

name: Angie Barnett
text: We just had our 4x8 foot storm shelter installed on July 22, 2021.  We cannot say enough positive things about the quality, price, and customer service of this company.  We have experienced several close calls with tornadoes in Chilton County during the past two years.  The anxiety of not having a safe place to take shelter, especially with several small grandchildren, was more than I could handle.  With this shelter, I feel such a peace of mind in knowing that we will be protected.  I researched several companies, and kept coming back to Safe-T-Shelters because of their great reviews as well as their personable customer service reps who answered MANY questions for us.  I highly recommend this company!

resp.text: Hey Angie. Thank you so much for the wonderful review. It was a pleasure working with you. We are so grateful for your support and for choosing us for your severe weather protection.

name: Josh Cross
text: After the tornado came through in 2019 we knew we had to get ourselves more prepared.  I reached out to Dustin at Safe-T-Shelter for some options.  They went above and beyond for us, they have a great product and great service too.  I highly recommend them if you want to have somewhere safe during the storms.

resp.text: Hey Josh. Thank you so much for the great review. It was a pleasure working with you and we hope our shelter will provide you and your family a lifetime of peace of mind during severe weather.

name: Hailey Gothard
text: The customer service is excellent!  They provided a great and quality product and went above and beyond!  Once it was installed they touched up places on the shelter that paint had come off during the trip down and made sure we were happy with everything.  Great product and wonderful people!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your support! We are happy to hear you are pleased with our product and service.

name: Tracey Perkins
text: Great service and so thankful for this peace of mind!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words and your support! We are happy to know our shelter has brought you peace of mind during severe weather.

name: Meredith Northington
text: Professional, kind, personable, and friendly service. The men who installed our shelter were excellent, and they left no mess. They took time to explain how our shelter works and answered any questions we had. We love the experience we had with Safe-T-Shelter.

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review!

name: kathryn seligman
text: Wonderful company! Quick install ... professional and polite! Iam not afraid of storms now and I don’t have to leave my house! Also best price around.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words! We are so glad to hear you are pleased with our product and service!!

name: Dax McDaniel
text: A simple process. They even gave my grandparents in law a referral check because they had also used them. Installation was a breeze. The delivery guys gave a full run down and extra ideas of what/ how to use it. Definitely 10/10

resp.text: Thank you so much for the compliment and choosing us!

name: Johnston Johnston
text: Excellent company. Very responsive and very informative throughout our whole buying process all the way to instalation even after installation they've contacted us. I wouldn't do business with any other company.. you get that local business feel from these guys.. we were beyond impressed with the quality of our shelter and it exceeded our expectations.. highly recommend this company to anyone looking to protect your family from storms or needing a safe room.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful review and thank you for choosing us for your severe weather protection!

name: Sally Jones
text: We are so happy to have our shelter completed! Every single person we dealt with was so nice a helpful. (No matter how many times I called LOL) The crews on site were great too. I am so thankful I don't have to drive to safety every time a bad storm is brewing! We are very pleased!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review! We are very thankful you chose us for your severe weather protection and are confident it will provide you safety and peace of mind for years to come.

name: brand elks
text: The 2 guys that came and put my T-Shelter in  they were Amazing and very nice they done a Great walk through to show me what I needed to Know on my T-Shelter Thanks Guys Job well done!!

resp.text: We are so grateful for your support and thank you for the great review and compliment!

name: Janis n Bill McBride
text: Very good experience.  The quote was for an installed product and the we're no "hidden" costs. The installers were efficient and polite.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review and we are happy to hear you are pleased with our product and service!

name: Tammy Jenkins
text: We are so thankful for our Safe- T- Shelter. They were easy to work with and the installers were friendly and efficient. We can rest easier now that we have one.

resp.text: Tammy, thank you so much for the great review. We are pleased to hear you are happy with our product and service and thank you for choosing us for your severe weather protection.

name: Kim R
text: Just had my storm shelter installed yesterday. I pray I never have to use it. But it’s a great relief to know I have it. From day 1 of inquiring about the shelter to installation customer service has been excellent. I would definitely recommend Safe-T-Shelter.

resp.text: Hey Kim. Thank you so much for choosing us for your severe weather protection. We are very thankful for your support and great review!

name: Glenn Hunter
text: Easy to deal with and very professional.  Shelter looks excellent and is highly durable.  Provides a lot of peace of mind having a shelter available.  Would highly recommend this company

resp.text: Hey Glenn, thank you so much for your support and the great review!!

name: Mitchell Mooneyham
text: We just received are storm shelter a few weeks ago. We love it and the staff there was very professional and courteous. They did an awesome job. Would definitely recommend this business.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review and the kind words. We greatly appreciate your support!

name: Scott Beaston
text: Great buying experience! Everything went smoothly, from purchasing through the install. My wife and I can't thank you enough!!

resp.text: Scott, thank you so much for your kind words and we are extremely grateful for your support!

name: Donna Forrester
text: Excellent service and workers. Friendly and informative. Efficient. Highly recommend them

resp.text:
Donna,
Thank you so much for the wonderful review. We greatly appreciate your support!

name: Lezlie Armentor
text: VERY Please with the service that I received from everyone with this company.  They went above and beyond to help me out and get it in place.  I would highly recommend them!  Thank you all!

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review! We are thrilled that we have exceeded your expectations and are grateful you chose us for your severe weather protection. Welcome to the STS family!

name: Mitch Lawson
text: excellent service and very sturdy structure.  I'll sleep better at night knowing my workers and I have a place to safely wait out bad storms now.

resp.text:
Mitch,
Thank you for your support! We hope you never need it but we are confident it will bring you safety and peace of mind during severe weather.

name: Jackie Dickerson
text: People here extremely helpful and friendly. If you need a Storm Shelter this is the place to get one. They stand behind their work and go the extra mile for you.

resp.text: Jackie, thank you so much for the wonderful review. We are so grateful for your support and are glad you were pleased with your shelter and experience!

name: Spooky 'Verb
text: Very satisfied. The installation took hardly any time at all. At last, when the alert goes out to get in our "safe space" we actually have one. Great job Safe-T-Shelter. Your customer service and installation team both rank A+! Was also nice to learn that, if need be, we could have them come and take it out (we have the 4'x5' shelter out in the garage) to install it in another house if we move. Awesome!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! We hope you never need it but are confident it will bring you safety and peace of mind during severe weather.

name: Ken Rabbitt
text: I was very happy with the installation. Gary and Mark were very professional and efficient. They were careful unloading and placing the shelter into the garage. It was a tight fit, but they were able to place it right where I wanted it. It’s so nice to work with experienced installers! They were done in about 2 hours. I would recommend Safe T Shelter to anyone. Thanks.

resp.text: Thank you for the fantastic review. We are grateful you chose STS for your storm protection and we hope you never need it. We will pass your kind remarks on to our installers.

name: Shanna Crumley
text: So satisfied with our storm shelter! Awesome customer service, easy installation, and peace of mind when storms come through. Would recommend Safe T Shelter to anyone looking for a shelter!

resp.text: We are extremely grateful that you chose us for your severe weather protection. Thank you for your wonderful review.

name: R. Christina McCoy
text: We are very happy with our new storm shelter. It didn’t take very long to install and the guys doing it were kind and professional. We definitely feel safer and more prepared for Alabama weather.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. We are very thankful that you chose us for your severe weather protection and we hope you never need it.

name: Mrs. Hubcap
text: We ordered our storm shelter Monday and they were able to install within 2 days!  The sales people were very helpful and helped us pick out the perfect size shelter for our family. The installers came out and installed our shelter in the pouring rain. They were awesome and very knowledgeable!  We feel so much safer now!  Great people!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!

name: Layron Doyal
text: It was a pleasure to do business with Safe-T-Shelters. If I could rate them a "10", I would do so. If you live in Alabama, call them! I had my shelter installed in less than 10 days. The gentlemen that installed the shelter were professional, thorough, and quick with the task. My wife and I own a barn-dominium and had concerns with the numerous storms in northern AL. This is well worth the investment and a reasonable price. NO gimmicks, pay for the shelter once installed and you are happy. Instead of a new car you don't need, buy a shelter from these folks. My families safety has no price!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review! We are thankful you chose us for your severe weather protection.

name: Gina Walker
text:
I am writing this review for my father, Ray Stowe. He contacted Safe-T-Shelters on a Tuesday and a gentleman came out on Friday to show him the best location.  After determining the location, he gave my dad a reasonable price quote.  After accepting the price, they made a date for installation, which was the following Monday.  They showed up on time and was extremely courteous and did everything that they said they would do.  My dad, Ray Stowe, said he would definitely recommend them to anyone who asks.

Thank you for installing this shelter for my parents and doing so in a timely and courteous fashion.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review. We hope you never need it but are thankful your family chose us!

name: The Cleaner Man
text: We have one from Safe-T-Shelter. We had it installed after we moved here from Connecticut.  Luckily we never truly tested it but I can say that it is built very well! I hope I never prove it can withstand an EF5 but I am pretty confident it should have no problem. The team that installed it was very professional and did a great job. I feel safe knowing me and my family are safer because of our shelter.  Since its above ground and in our garage, we don't have to be exposed to the storms to enter it.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and taking time from your day to leave us a review!

name: Phebe
text: Awesome job installing my Safe T Shed.. very pleased with the professionalism and speed .. was installed much faster than I thought it would be.. Thank you

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and we are extremely grateful for your support!

name: Beth Baker
text: We are so happy with our new Safe-T-Shelter that was installed last month!  From the first phone call we placed for information, the office staff answered all of our questions and we were thrilled to have it installed so quickly.  The guys were prompt, clean and a pleasure to work with.  Hope we never have to use it - but it is certainly reassuring that we have it in place.  Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you Beth for the great review and kind words!

name: Melissa herring
text: I love how knowledgeable they are about their products.  They were able to answer all my questions and had a plan that was laid out just to fit my needs. Brent was friendly and was very professional. I recommend them for all your safety shelter needs.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words.

name: Jared T
text: Safe-T-Shelter’s customer service and shelter build quality are excellent.  The shelter was delivered and installed in a timely manner.  The installation team conducted themselves in a professional manner and cleaned up after job completion.  I would recommend Safe-T-Shelter to anyone looking for excellent customer service, high quality, and a professional installation team.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Rod Lovett
text: Professional people with a great product and it is a locally owned business. Always happy to spend my money with local businesses. Quick and easy process for a peace of mind product.

resp.text: Hey Rod. Thank you so much for the kind words. We are thankful you chose us for your storm shelter and are delighted you are pleased with our product and service.

name: TERESA DAWN THOMAS
text: We have had ours for 6 years- they were easy to work with, affordable and delivered & installed in a timely manner. If you have young children, get them some magnets and let them decorate the walls. It can turn a scary situation into an adventure.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words and we are grateful for your business. That is a wonderful idea about the magnets, we will definitely recommend that to people.

name: cherry bailey
text: Great installation and plenty of room in our shelter! Had ours since 2012! Peace of mind now for us knowing we will be ok during a tornado!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review! We are glad even after 8 years you are still very pleased with our product.

name: Cynthia Cross
text: We recently had a shelter installed in our garage. The people were very professional and courteous. We were very pleased with the information provided to us and the service provided. I would definitely recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words.  We greatly appreciate your business.

name: Diane Elam
text: I had a safe shelter installed at my home in the spring. Thanks to God I have not had to use it yet. I got the V-shaped that fits in the corner of my carport so it fits perfect neck to my SUV. Great company to work with! They were there the vey day and time they scheduled installation.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing us for your severe weather protection and the great review!

name: Lorin Sumpter
text: The welding supplies you need are waiting patiently with a good staff to assist.

name: George Glass
text: Great people that work their

name: David Welch
text: Great Staff , great prices , always willing to help you , no matter what you are doing !

name: David Kilburn
text: They gave me a great deal on a long handle Smith torch. Very much appreciated

name: James Freeman
text: The best ever

name: Tony Studdard
text: Great customer service. Friendly and personal.

name: Theresa Perdue
text:
The staff is very friendly and prices are great.
I went to exchange some tanks we had bought my husband as I was walking into business they were actually on the phone with him.

name: Xquizet
text: As long as you speak with management you can get things resolved pretty quickly

name: Albert Turley
text: Went ther las week for safety glasses & they said they would order they ! Still not in ! !  - don't believe they did Order !

name: Mark H
text: This is a difficult company to work with.  They do not respond to the needs of their customers.  I am very disappointed with their customer service.

name: Ricky Montgomery
text: Great service.

name: William Wheat
text: Good stock of welding supplies, a little pricey and employees not very helpful

name: Marco Antonio Peregrina Sauce
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent service

(Original)
Excelente servicio

name: Christopher Senn
text: After being treated like a thief at Wesco, I went to Airgas. They were very polite and helpful.  I was able to shop without being followed around. They are now my go to for supplies

name: Randy Wolf
text: Fast and friendly service. The guys at the city sales desk answered all my questions  professionally and in great detail that made me feel as if I was getting advice from a long time friend.

name: Barry Johnson
text: Super nice folks, great prices.  It is worth the drive to find these guys

name: William Leake
text: Prompt service, got me in and out in no time ,Thanks

name: Rick Maze
text: Good staff. Good selection. Price is high but they can work with you on it.

name: Scott Suttle
text: Knowledgeable staff.

name: Dennis Turnbaugh
text: Store great, employees werent to helpful! No prices on products and they made it seem like it was a Hassle to look a price up for me... So i didnt stay long and purchased my list elsewhere. Which was a $800 list. Other than that my experience was good!

name: William McPherson
text: Great employees that really help you out!! They have any gas that you need. Thanks

name: Mike Hump
text: Good store well stocked service a little slow

name: Mark Turner
text: The men behind the counter,answered the call,gave me the info I needed,and was there with the parts I was in search of!

name: Landrey Robertson
text: We’ve been a customer for a few months now, we had a mechanic lose everything he owned and uniform he had in a tornado on 3/25. I called Morgan on Friday 3/26 to let her know what happened. On Monday 4/5 an ENTIRE set of new uniforms were delivered. We cannot express our gratitude enough for these wonderful people.

name: Brandon Parsons
text: Great service, great people, always making sure things are done correctly. Strongly suggest any company looking for a uniform supplier to give them a shot. Or anyone who is not satisfied with their current provider. These guys are the best at what they do.

name: Lara Little
text: Love our UniFirst service here in Anniston!  Our route guy is Matt Hendrix and he always makes sure he takes care of our employees uniforms and our supply needs.  I've worked with other uniform services in the past and can honestly say UniFirst has been by far the best service I've encountered.  Highly recommend!

name: John Schafer
text: Great service. We swapped from another company who will remain nameless. Got way better prices and the customer service is by far better.

name: Heather Caldwell
text: We have been using UniFirst for almost 10 years. They have great service and if there is an issue they try to resolve it quickly. Chris our delivery guy is really good at his job and has a great attitude and is fun to talk to

name: Cindy Webster
text: We work in Tuscaloosa, and Chris is our "guy". He is amazing. I know he will be here every Tuesday morning bright and early, always with a smile on his face. Always speaks to everyone he encounters. If I have ever had a problem with our bill or just a question about the uniforms he his always there to help. I really dont think I have ever seen him in an ill mood. Great Job Chris!!!!!!!

name: Landrey Robertson
text: We have tried every uniform company available to us in our area, we switched to Unifirst several months ago and have been nothing less than pleased! The customer service is 10/5 stars. They even made my three year old son a custom uniform to match the "big guys" here at work. If you have a question or concern you get to talk to YOUR team of Unifirst Reps and they personally make sure you are taken care of and satisfied with their service.

name: Jennifer Kiel
text: I love my WonderWink scrubs!  Hygienically cleaned and very reasonable.

name: Ben S
text: Our uniform company is unifirst they are a great company and our route man is Chris he is great and always friendly and polite would recommend this company for all uniform needs

name: Leigh Anne Sullivan
text: Our rep, Chris, is AWESOME! Skyland Auto & Tire in Tuscaloosa, AL receives excellent service & professionalism!

name: Jeff Shackelford
text:
It’s a fabulous company and I highly Reccomend - Unifirst sets the standard for how uniform
Rental should be

name: Flavio Udinese
text: excellent place, friendly people, price also good.

name: Adam Lesley
text: Chris is always on time and does a great job taking care of us! Would always recommend!

name: Brent Keith
text: Great friendly service from Kendall!

name: Devin Robison
text: Never get back a weeks worth of pants, sometimes I get 2 sometimes none and then the next I might get back 10

name: Melissa McClellen
text: UniFirst does an amazing job.  Justin is our guy with UniFirst and he gives us the best, quick but efficient service EVER.  I speak for our company when I say, we couldn't ask for better.

name: David Mccormick
text: I have been using UniFirst  for 14 years. Scott Langston has always taken care of any issues as soon as they happen. Great customer Service.

name: Brian Richey
text: Have been using UniFirst for over 20 years and would recommend to any company looking for a uniform program to use UniFirst.  Great management.

name: Derek Vicker
text: Very happy with the service

name: David Savage
text: We have had flawless service from Scott Langston. Happy with the customer service he provides. Uniforms made easy !

name: Jerry Sherrell
text: Scott Langston is just like part of the family... He is very knowledgeable and good at what he does. We are glad to have him.

name: JD Humphries
text: great service and resolves issues in a timely fashion

name: Beverly VanOrden
text: Sent in weeks worth of uniforms and now my other week an my husband and son only have one a piece.. So not a happy camper right now having to wash every night one set an the every morning the other cause one works days and other works nights for same company..

resp.text: Our apologies and thanks for bringing this to our attention. UniFirst has built its positive reputation by delivering excellence in customer service, and it appears one of our Locations may have fallen short of our expectations. Please call our centralized customer service team at (800) 794-2706, so we can open an official Service Request. This closed-loop, computerized system features an automated tracking and resolution process, so issues never fall through the cracks. We record all concerns for follow up within 24 hours, assign clear accountability for actions, maintain a history of requests and actions taken, and close the request only after your satisfaction is confirmed. We appreciate your business and never take it for granted. Thanks for your patience while we work to fix this.

name: Eat Sleep Disc. Com
text: We get our Logo Polo Shirts & Hats from Unifirst.  Great quality & price.  Would definitely buy from them again!

name: Allyson Hann
text: I work for Icemakers, Inc.  Deal with Justin every Monday and he is a very top notch employee.  Unifirst always has great customer service and their products are very well taken care of.  If we ever have an issue it is handled promptly.

name: Connie Lawson
text: Derrick does an awesome job taking care of all our uniform needs. Very pleased with the service!

name: Diane Clark
text: Scott does an outstanding job handling our uniform needs.

name: Pam Bullock
text: Justin Sargent is our delivery person at Evoqua Water Technologies in Irondale AL. He is courteous, well mannered, and all around nice person. We have no complaints on the uniform service as of yet.

name: Steve Simmons
text:
I was not looking to change Uniform company's, when the President of our company asked me to review prices and services.
After meeting with Jady Hubbard and Jamie Pope from Unifirst, it was obvious I needed to make a change. I was able to save the company a considerable amount of money with increased services.
Jady Hubbard and Jamie Pope with Unifirst were always available with answers and made changing company's a smooth transition.

name: Steven Hughes
text: UniFirst has an amazing maintenance manager.

name: Rodney Dennis
text: Justin does a great at Clark memorials.

name: Joe Driver
text: I've been having a problem with my uniforms not fitting correctly ... All of them all the same size but do not all fit the same I've made one phone call and they came right out re-measured me and he getting me all new uniforms ... If you're looking for uniform company try try UniFirst before you spend time and money getting disappointed by the other companies

name: Derrick Marrisett
text: Great people Great place to work

name: J C
text: Good selection but high prices on most items. However the have parts that you can’t get elsewhere. I need some aluminum angle and they beat Home Depot and Lowes prices by far.

name: Paul Streeter
text: Great helpful advice on my project, thanks

resp.text: Thanks for the nice review! Our goal is to always be the best partner possible to our customers. Glad to hear we were able to help you out! ^Paul, Grainger Social Team

name: Jack Lloyd
text: Worst customer service.  Having people wait for hour to get service is unacceptable.

resp.text: Jack, we're sorry your Grainger experience wasn't satisfactory and would like to look into it further. Please email our customer service team at social@grainger.com with your name, the branch you visited, and a brief description of your experience. We appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback and an opportunity for us to improve your experience. ^Amber, Grainger Social Team

name: Mac Thomas
text: They didn't have what I was looking for but they gave it a hellava try!

resp.text:
We're very happy we could help, Mac! Thank you for sharing this and thanks for choosing Grainger!
^Paul, Grainger Social Team

name: Richard Norwood
text: Store personnel is extremely helpful and friendly. Sometimes the parts I order aren’t immediately available but they can usually get it in next day. Prices are somewhat competitive but I understand I’m shopping at an industrial supply house.

resp.text:
Thanks for the nice review! Our goal is to always be the best partner possible to our customers. Glad to hear we were able to help you out!
^Paul, Grainger Social Team

name: Mike Heard
text: I took a long list of tools I needed to purchase to the local store here in Huntsville, AL. The took the list and told me it would be a couple of days.  Here it is two weeks latter and I have heard nothing.  To top that, when I look to find their business phone number it is the corporate phone number and they cannot give you the store number.  I will not attempt to do business with them again.  If there was a zero star I would have selected it.  What poor customer service.

resp.text: Mike, we're sorry your Grainger branch experience wasn't satisfactory and would like to look into it further. Please email our customer service team at social@grainger.com with your name, the branch you visited, and a brief description of your experience (including order number, account number, or any other information you feel may be helpful). We appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback and an opportunity for us to improve your experience. ^Amber, Grainger Social Team

name: Thomas McNutt
text: They were very helpful considering what is going on with the virus.

resp.text:
Thanks for the nice review, Thomas! Our goal is to always be the best partner possible to our customers. Glad to hear we were able to help you out!
^Paul, Grainger Social Team

name: Shane Gann
text: I need an electric motor, I called the store and got a call center, the lady knew nothing about parts, read her multiple parts numbers off the motor and the fan it was attached to. She finally said we are just going to have to call tech support.......really? I just need to know if the motor is in the store before I drive all the way over there.

name: Zac Lott
text: Excellent staff and competitive pricing . These guys are spot on with information and delivery times. The store and warehouse has everything you need to get the job done!

name: John Lott
text: Friendly, helpful owners. Helping people with anxiety, depression, body pain, arthritis,  and pets too! Thank you for helping people live happy lives.

name: sherry stahr
text: Friendly staff. Knowledgeable owner. Nice clean and welcoming environment... I will definitely recommend this place to others.

name: CamoGnome Gaming
text: If I could give more stars I would...

name: Randy Frost
text: Always first class training!

name: Cctrapper 2
text: Great customer service

name: Eddie Blair
text: Excellent classroom and hands on training.

name: Artie Rose
text: Great service and great people, very knowledgeable about welding supplies and all types of gases.

name: Dan S
text: Very friendly and informative,  great customer service! I will definitely use them again. Thank you! Great place to get dry ice for anything you need!

name: Jarvius Walls
text: Just had an interview with Mr. Craig. Super cool dude. Whether I get the job or not, the experience was professional. Seems like a nice place to work.

name: Arthur Rose
text: Welding equipment and supplies, all types of compressed and Liquid gases

name: Thomas Hughes
text: Great company to deal with, excellent customer service.

name: Grace Dyal
text: Seems like the sales person was learning, but did good job. They had to order lens which was supposed to come to my house but he called and told me they were delivered to the store instead.  He was going to resend them them to my address, but I was going to be in Sylacauga the next day so I asked him to keep them and I would and did come by and get them.

name: Matt Dodgen
text: Price double between a phone quote and the time it took me to get there

name: Eric Cook
text: Just seemed a little high $134 to fill a tank of Argon??

name: Kim Kimbrough
text: Great people

name: Eric Dumas
text: Great service alot of hard to find ironworker tools and plenty of welding supplies

name: BOSS HOG Torque Converters
text: They were very helpful and listened to what I really needed.  I would suggest that you check them out. Welding is what we do.

name: Jack Horton
text: They have drove the price up as of late .will go to young welding next time.

name: Roger1967 Roger1967
text: Very helpful

name: Maaya Kumar
